summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in block 58, D.T. Denny's Park Addition, being the alley between 4th Avenue North and 5th Avenue North, from Denny Way to John Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 97017 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
